titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Aluminum tris (O-ethylphosphonate).
A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Aluminum tris (O-ethylphosphonate).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the duty treatment of aluminum tris (O-ethylphosphonate).
